edu.mills.cs122.lab6

Class ReplacementScheme

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.mills.cs122.lab6.ReplacementScheme
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    FifoReplacementScheme, NruReplacementScheme, RandomReplacementScheme

    public abstract class ReplacementScheme
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract representation of a page table replacement scheme. Clients should call getFrameToReplace() when they need to select a frame into which to load a page. This will either return the first invalid frame, if one is available, or the result of getFrameToReplace().

    When loading a page into a frame, the client must call registerLoadToFrame(int), and the client must call registerAccessToFrame(int) whenever accessing the frame (including the first time). While these two calls provide no immediate benefit to the client, they enable the scheme to keep track of frame usage and to keep the usage statistics accessible with getNumAccesses() and getNumPageReplacements().

    Author:
    Ellen Spertus (spertus@mills.edu)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReplacementScheme(int numFrames)
      Constructor of a replacement scheme managing the specified number of frames.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract int getFrameToReplace()
      Returns the index of the frame whose contents should be replaced.
      int getNumAccesses()
      Returns the number of successful accesses of data in this page table (the number of calls to registerAccessToFrame(int)).
      int getNumPageReplacements()
      Returns the number of times frames have had to be loaded since creation of this ReplacementScheme.
      void registerAccessToFrame(int frame)
      Registers that the specified frame was accessed (whether due to a hit or a load).
      void registerLoadToFrame(int frame)
      Registers that the specified frame is being loaded with new contents.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReplacementScheme

        public ReplacementScheme(int numFrames)
        Constructor of a replacement scheme managing the specified number of frames.
        Parameters:
        numFrames - the number of frames to keep track of

    • Method Detail

      • registerLoadToFrame

        public void registerLoadToFrame(int frame)
        Registers that the specified frame is being loaded with new contents. This erases the past history (for LRU, MRU, etc.) and sets the time loaded (for FIFO, LIFO, etc.).
        Parameters:
        frame - the index of the frame being loaded with new contents.

      • registerAccessToFrame

        public void registerAccessToFrame(int frame)
        Registers that the specified frame was accessed (whether due to a hit or a load). This is useful for implementing LRU, MRU, and NRU.
        Parameters:
        frame - the index of the accessed frame

      • getFrameToReplace

        public abstract int getFrameToReplace()
        Returns the index of the frame whose contents should be replaced. Implementations should return the index of an invalid frame, if any exist. Otherwise, the result depends on the replacement strategy. The history of the frame should not be affected by this call.
        Returns:
        the index of the frame whose contents should be replaced

      • getNumAccesses

        public int getNumAccesses()
        Returns the number of successful accesses of data in this page table (the number of calls to registerAccessToFrame(int)).
        Returns:
        the number of successful accesses of data in this page table

      • getNumPageReplacements

        public int getNumPageReplacements()
        Returns the number of times frames have had to be loaded since creation of this ReplacementScheme.
        Returns:
        the number of times frames have had to be loaded
